name: Le Vagabond Part I: GOTY EDITION feat. qzeq
name_original: Le Vagabond Part I: GOTY EDITION feat. qzeq
description:
Le Vagabond is a game loosely based on the hit kineogames from genius SC Jogos such as, Barro Racing and Andarilho.

In Le Vagabond you play as the Vagabond, Andarilho's son out to avenge his father after he was murdered by blood thirsty zombies.

BASED ON THE WORKS OF SC JOGOS

WRITTEN BY: 

DIEUX BAISHINEUX

ALICE PIERRE

 QUEBEC CANADA

ISABELLE BAGUETTE

GAME BY: 

SHIGERU ALICEOTO

HIDIA KOJIMA

Not so proudly made by Hideout Games and published by Internet Inc.

https://internetinc.bandcamp.com/

P.S: Game not actually made by French people (Ew).
